DOC.brief_title: Acupuncture Anxiety Women With Breast Cancer : A Feasibility Study
DOC.detailed_description: This feasibility study acupuncture anxiety reduction woman breast cancer . Ten patient recruited UNM Cancer Research Treatment Center via Breast Clinic screen anxiety . Treatment consist 10 acupuncture session 5 week . Measures ( Hopkins Symptom Checklist , Sheehan Disability Index ) administer analyzed treatment effect score .
DOC.criteria: Woman age 18 year old exclude need parental/guardian permission . Histologic diagnosis breast cancer . Having minimum anxiety score 1.75 Hopkins Symptom Checklist ( HSCL ) sufficient English language proficiency investigator make determination . Able give inform consent . Willingness participate study receive 10 acupuncture treatment 5 week . Ability fill questionnaires communicate research staff Males breast cancer Psychoses major personality disorder Current use opiate ,
